A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Fantastic movie. I’ll admit it starts out a little disjointed and I thought I was going to be disappointed but after the first 45 minutes to an hour or so the movie is phenomenal. Yes\, the scenes with Finn and Rose aren’t too interesting and some characters are not explained as well as they should’ve been and I know fans will be disappointed. However it is a great movie that will be a great experience for most people.
